props.name: onClose
props.description: This callback is invoked when a gesture to close the dialog is performed. The first argument indicates the gesture.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the ConfirmationDialog. This is usually a brief question.

props.name: cancelButtonContent
props.description: The text to use for the cancel button.

props.name: confirmButtonContent
props.description: The text to use for the confirm button.

props.name: confirmButtonType
props.description: The type of button to use for the confirm button.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional class names to apply to the dialog.

props.name: width
props.description:
The width of the dialog.
small: 296px
medium: 320px
large: 480px
xlarge: 640px

props.name: height
props.description:
The height of the dialog.
small: 480px
large: 640px
auto: variable based on contents
